ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var bookid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
//å‘é€è¯„è®º
const bookva = book.getVariable("custom");

if (bookva != false && bookva !== "" && source.getLoginHeader()) {
    const commenturl = "https://alicesw.org/home/comment/add.html";
    let body = `content=${bookva}&type=novel&mid=${bookid}`
  try {
    let code = String(java.getVerificationCode(`data:image/svg+xml;base64,${codesvg}`));
    if (code == "è¯„è®º" || /^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
//java.log(code);
if (/^@\d+$/.test(code)) {
	   let contid = code.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
    body += `&pid=${contid}`
}
//java.log(body);
    let headers = {
        "x-requested-with": "XMLHttpRequest"
    }
    let ok = java.post(commenturl, body, headers).body();
    java.toast(JSON.parse(ok).msg);
    book.putCustomVariable("");
     } else {
     	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(40);
     	java.toast('è¯·æŒ‰å›¾ç‰‡è¦æ±‚å¡«å†™ã€‚');
     	book.putCustomVariable("");
     	}
    } catch(err) {
    	java.log(err);
    	book.putCustomVariable("");
    	}
  } else if(bookva != false && bookva !== "" && !source.getLoginHeader()) {
	java.toast("æœªç™»å½•ï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•åæ“ä½œ");
	book.putCustomVariable("");
}

try{
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['ä¹¦ç±ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = $('[property$=image]@content').includes('alicesw.org') ? $('[property$=image]@content') : "https://alicesw.org" + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {
	               "ID": bookid,
                "img": img,

                "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
                "info": $('[property$=description]@content'),
                "url": "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl
            }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {
	java.log("ç™»å½•UIæœªåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¿å­˜æ•°æ®ï¼š"+err);
	}
src;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = source.key
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
var ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

var chapterul = java.hexDecodeToString(src);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = java.ajax(chapterul);

function content(ht) {
    let text;
    if (ht.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": chapterul
        };
        try {
            let s = ht.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(chapterul);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', tx);
        } catch(error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', ht);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = content(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
    	    retryCount++;
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
        text = content(html);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;
</js>
